title: Calories in a Frosty
meta_description: Learn calories in a frosty with full nutrition for a medium Wendy's Chocolate Frosty: 470 kcal, macros, fiber, sugars, and easy tweaks for sizes.
assumptions: Medium Wendy's Chocolate Frosty (16 oz serving); based on official nutrition data, no toppings added.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, flavor, location, and customizations. Check Wendy's app or labels for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A medium Wendy's Chocolate Frosty contains about 470 calories and 12 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Small size (12 oz) instead of medium
Large size (20 oz) instead of medium
Add whipped cream and cherry topping

faqs.q: How many calories in a small Frosty?
faqs.a: A small Wendy's Chocolate Frosty has about 340 calories.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Frosty?
faqs.a: A medium Frosty has 76 g total carbs, including 64 g sugars and 2 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a Frosty high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, a medium has 64 g sugars, mostly from milk and chocolate syrup.

faqs.q: How much protein in a Frosty?
faqs.a: About 12 g protein per medium Frosty from dairy ingredients.

faqs.q: Calories in a vanilla Frosty vs. chocolate?
faqs.a: Similar; a medium vanilla has around 460 kcal, slightly less sugar.
